answers.answer: I feel like I'm ALWAYS at the Dr. lolI'm high risk because I lost my first baby in Aug at 10+ weeks so this one they are keeping a close watch on. I'm currently 22 weeks 4 days and besides hormones things are going well & so far no diabetes this time. Last time I knew something was wrong but this time I think we're going to be ok ;)Congrats and Good LuckAgreed the best part of being high risk is seeing your baby and hearing the heartbeat frequently.
Me, bit because I am having twins.
I'm considered high risk because my first pregnancy I had my son at 34w2d, so 6weeks early. So there watching me close this time
Me ive had miscarriages and i have poly cystic ovarian syndrome so im high risk im 21+2 doin well
Me ive had miscarriages and i have poly cystic ovarian syndrome so im high risk im 21+2 doin well

I have to go every two weeks also. I am also diabetic so instantly high risk. I'm 20 weeks with baby #3 and everything has been going great no complications. I didn't have any problems with my other two pregnancies either they were just large babies even tho my blood sugars stayed very well controlled. Just hoping for this one to continue being a happy healthy pregnancy. Congrats! Hope everything goes great for ya!

I am I'm 24+6 I have what maybe a bad placenta or umbilical cord I'm pProm that caused oligohydramnios and I had a subchorionic hemorrhage..I go I'm for an ulta sound every two weeks and nst every week starting in 2 weeks
I'm at high risk for preterm labor... I am 30 weeks pregnant and my son is going to be here at 36 weeks. I have doctor appointments every week to be checked. You aren't alone hun.
I'm considered high risk bc of my age and early diabetis..I have to go every two wks aswell...today they are doing a amniocentesis that I'm nervous about...good luck to everyone

I'm at high risk because on September I had a miscarriages I was 11 weeks so whenever I found on I was pregnant ill been going to to doctor every 2 weeks and because I'm diabetes but thank god every things is going good for me and my baby girl :) I'm 28w/3days.

question: I'm 9 weeks today and im high risk. I have to go every two weeks to be checked out but I also get an ultrasound done every time I go. Im Diabetic with Hypertention. Just wanted to know if there is anyone else out there with the same medical issues and if so how has your pregnancy been this far?
title: Are there any other high risk mommys out there?
